# categoryType

**Instance Property**

The category type for this sample.

## Declaration

```swift
var categoryType: HKCategoryType { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains a reference to the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKSample/sampleType] property that is cast as an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKCategoryType] object.

## Getting Property Data

- **value**: The category value for this sample.
